tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE flexible_work_arrangements (
    request_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    request_date DATE NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    reason TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE flexible_work_requests (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  request_date DATE,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  reason TEXT,
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE approval_history (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  request_id INT,
  approved_by VARCHAR(50),
  approval_date DATE,
  comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE flexible_work_arrangements (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  request_date DATE,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  reason TEXT,
  status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE approval_history (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  request_id INT,
  reviewer_id INT,
  review_date DATE,
  decision VARCHAR(50),
  comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE flexible_work_arrangements (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  request_date DATE,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  reason TEXT,
  status VARCHAR(50)
);
